item.title: Union flags on lamp posts along Granville Rd, 29th September
item.description:
The 4 flags were hung in the midst of being associated with aggressive, racist behaviour. The flags have also been hung very high and close to the light provided, so they also pose a health and safety risk by blocking out light for those walking along the road at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Granville Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light., 29th September
item.description:
This street light has been out for a week now, it is outside properties that house elderly people that feel quite vulnerable. We would appreciate it if it could be fixed as soon as is possible, Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Blow Crescent, Coldblow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Trees, 29th September
item.description:
180 Green Lane has a number of trees art the side of their property and aren't maintaining them - there are overhanging trees blocking the pavement so if you have to walk in the road to go around them. Someone 2 months ago trimmed the hanging bits so you can duct down to walk under them but then they grew back - someone trimmed the last week but it will happen again - someone needs to completely cut them back to the fence boundary so they are not obstructing the path. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Broad Lawn, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter bon overflowing bus stop G, 29th September
item.description:
The bin was emptied on Friday26th September morning - has been missed for some reason today 29th September. Usually emptied early morning pick up. Starting to overflow on main road South Circular.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Common, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
